banner: Use nature language to process your video
processPrompt: HOW DO YOU WANT TO PROCESS YOUR VIDEO?

faq_1.title: What can I do with LLMCut?
faq_1.text: LLMCut is a video editing tool that helps you quickly edit videos.

faq_2.title: How to use LLMCut?
faq_2.text: Upload your video and input your editing requirements in the text box. LLM will generate ffmpeg commands and process your video with ffmpeg in WASM.

faq_3.title: How long does it take to process a video?
faq_3.text: A few minutes, depending on your computer's performance.
